summary: REQ-15 appears implemented in HeroSection: the Hero content is centered with a max-width container, includes the literal greeting “Hi, I'm {resumeData.name}”, keeps the “Computer Science” line centered below, and preserves centered CTA buttons that scroll to #contact and #about.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded Hero background decoration elements (blurred gradient circles) not requested as part of centering/greeting restoration.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-15 only requests centering/layout alignment and restoring the “Hi, I’m …” headline while keeping existing lines/buttons; it does not mention adding new background visuals.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated repository meta/documentation state files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json) beyond the requested Hero layout/text change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest targets the Hero/Intro section behavior; it does not request updating project summary/state artifacts.
